mapper.insert: insert into t_c_contract(contractname, contractnum, amount, durationtime, signtime, contractpartyb, remark, priority, status, isdisabled, operuser, operdate, subofficeid) values(#{contractName}, #{contractNum}, #{amount}, #{durationTime}, #{signTime}, #{contractPartyB}, #{remark}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{isDisabled}, #{operUser}, #{operDate}, #{subofficeId})
mapper.select: select b.*,a.monthamount,a.year,a.month from t_c_contractexecute a,( select ct.contractid,ct.contractname,ct.contractnum,s.subofficeid,s.subofficename, ct.amount,sum(cte.monthamount) amountyear, convert(sum(cte.monthamount)/ct.amount*100,decimal(15,2))percent from t_c_contractexecute cte,t_c_contract ct,t_s_suboffice s where cte.contractid=ct.contractid and ct.subofficeid=s.subofficeid group by cte.contractid) b where a.contractid = b.contractid and a.year=2019 and a.month=2
mapper.insert: insert into t_c_contractexecute(contractid, monthamount, year, month, remark, priority, isdisabled, operuser, operdate) values(#{contractId}, #{monthamount}, #{year}, #{month}, #{remark}, #{priority}, #{isDisabled}, #{operUser}, #{operDate})
mapper.select:
select a.subofficename departStr,a.subofficeid,b.*,c.balanceTotalStr,c.payforTotalStr from (t_s_suboffice a left join (select su.subofficeid, sum(ct.amount) contractTotalStr,sum(sw.monthrealityinvest) thisMonthInvestStr, sum(sw.yearrealityinvest) thisYtmTotalStr,sum(sw.finishinvest) investTotalStr from t_s_subofficewrite sw,t_c_contract ct,t_s_suboffice su where sw.contractid = ct.contractid and su.subofficeid=ct.subofficeid
and (sw.year = #{year} )
and (sw.month = #{month} )
group by su.subofficeid) b on a.subofficeid=b.subofficeid) left join (select aa.subofficeid, sum(case when aa.costtype='01' then aa.balanceTotalStr else 0 end) 'balanceTotalStr', sum(case when aa.costtype in ('02','03') then aa.balanceTotalStr else 0 end) 'payforTotalStr' from ( select subofficeid,costtype,sum(money) balanceTotalStr from t_f_financingwrite where costtype in (01,02,03)
and (writeyear = #{year} )
and (writemonth = #{month} )
group by subofficeid,costtype) aa ) c on a.subofficeid=c.subofficeid
